definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Summer afternoons are frequently accompanied by thunderstorms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的午后经常伴有雷暴雨。

sentences.english: CNS infections may be associated with brain atrophy, with resultant microcephaly and ventriculomegaly.
sentences.chinese: 有关，伴有小头畸形和脑室扩大的后果。

sentences.english: Patients with hypoproteinemia or prolonged prothrombin time(PT) were often accompanied by hypocalcemia.
sentences.chinese: 低蛋白血症和PT延长的病例伴有低血钙较常见。

sentences.english: There is an area of bone destruction accompanied by partial calcification, with no periosteal reactive new bone.
sentences.chinese: 骨组织局部破坏并伴有钙化，没有骨膜反应性新生骨。

sentences.english: Symptoms include fever and muscle aches, often with other gastrointestinal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 病症包括发烧和肌肉疼痛，常伴有其他肠胃病的症状。

sentences.english: The robe unveils a pale straw yellow with gold tints.
sentences.chinese: 浅黄色的酒体伴有黄金色彩。

sentences.english: Results Injuries of the trachea and bronchi were of high frequency in severe chest and neck trauma.
sentences.chinese: 结果严重胸部损伤病人通常伴有气管支气管损伤。

sentences.english: Often is accompanied by uterus's position to be unusual.
sentences.chinese: 常伴有子宫体的位置异常。

sentences.english: The onset may not be accompanied by any of the acute signs but may appear insidiously.
sentences.chinese: 发病时可能不伴有任何急性症状，但可能隐匿地出现。

sentences.english: The latter is usually accompanied by multiple lytic lesions of the skull.
sentences.chinese: 后者通常伴有颅骨多发性囊性病变。

sentences.english: Schizencephaly is frequently associated with other neuronal developmental disorders.
sentences.chinese: 脑裂性孔洞脑经常伴有其他的神经系统发育障碍。

sentences.english: Chikungunya is characterized by an abrupt onset of fever frequently accompanied by joint pain.
sentences.chinese: 基孔肯雅热的特征是突然发热，经常伴有关节痛。

sentences.english: Often accompany have glossitis or quarrel is phlogistic.
sentences.chinese: 常常伴有舌炎或口角炎。

sentences.english: Left dry throat pain, cough, sputum color white yellow.
sentences.chinese: 咽喉左侧干疼，伴有咳嗽，白黄相间色痰。

sentences.english: The aorta above the valve displays a smooth intima with no atherosclerosis .
sentences.chinese: 主动脉瓣上方的血管内膜光滑，不伴有动脉粥样硬化。

definition: cyanosis (blue skin due to lack of oxygen in blood)
